name: Casa Nyxa
description:
Casa Nyxa is a short replayable narrative game set in one place but that let the player understand and interact with the whole city. 

It is set in the Hyllios universe, a world that I have created during my Game Design studies.

Hyllios is a city floating in space since its home planet destruction. Citizens' life is defined by what they can make with the energy that is in their veins. It is also the fuel to the whole city.

You are Nyx, a barman that can change pure energy into wonderful drinks. You will use this capacity to know about your clients life and help them reach their dreams. 

While Astre is set outside of the city of Hyllios, this game takes places directly in the city and more precisely in the bar called Casa Nyxa.
